titleStmt.title: Good news to all people. Glad tydings for all men. God good unto all, and Christ the saviour of the world: or, The general point faithfully handled by way of exercise: or A sermon preached at Buckingham upon the 25 of March, being (as so called) Easter-day. By William Hartley.
titleStmt.author: Hartley, William, of Stony-Stratford.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock for Lodowick Lloyd, and Henry Cripps, and are to be sold at their shop in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
